Explanations about Options.-l: Specifies the last page to scan.
Explanations about Options.-j:
Write images in JPEG format as JPEG files instead of the default format. The JPEG
 file is identical to the JPEG data stored in the PDF.
Explanations about Options.-f: Specifies the first page to scan.

Explanations about Options.-m:
Display files in time machine format so that a timeline can be created with
 mactime(1). The string given as mnt will be prepended to the file names as the
 mounting point (for example /usr).
Explanations about Options.-r:
Recursively display directories. This will not follow deleted directories, because
 it can't.
Explanations about Options.-o: The sector offset where the file system starts in the image.
